author: 网易
title: 乔-约翰逊：我和詹姆斯在季后赛交过手 我认为他是最难防守的|韦德|科比|乔丹|勒布朗詹姆斯|勒布朗·詹姆斯|乔·马库斯·约翰逊_网易订阅
text:
直播吧3月20日讯 今日，前NBA球星乔-约翰逊接受了播客节目《Run It Back》的采访。
当被问到在他的生涯中觉得乔丹、科比、詹姆斯和韦德谁更难防守，约翰逊说：“我可能必须得选勒布朗，我来告诉你理由。因为我和他在季后赛中交过手，我和其他人没打过季后赛系列赛。在季后赛系列赛交锋中，你知道他们会做的一切事情，而你要努力阻止他们那么做。他很特别，他每一晚都是如此。我不禁感叹，‘靠！’所以我不清楚他们具体的强硬程度，但我和勒布朗在一些系列赛中打过，他很特别。我和韦德在一些系列赛中打过，他也很特别。那些可以随心所欲出手投篮的家伙是最难防守的。”

author: @everyeye
title: Black Friday nero per Amazon: maxi-sciopero dei lavoratori in 20 Paesi
text:
Black Friday nero per Amazon: maxi-sciopero dei lavoratori in 20 Paesi
La scorsa settimana, era stato anticipato che i [lavoratori Amazon avrebbero scioperato](https://tech.everyeye.it/notizie/amazon-black-friday-sciopero-dipendenti-mobilitazione-20-paesi-759594.html) nel corso del Black Friday. E così alla fine è stato: la protesta "Make Amazon Pay" è scattata venerdì 29 novembre e continuerà fino al 2 dicembre, stando alle sigle sindacali che l'hanno organizzata e la stanno conducendo in questi giorni.
Gli aggiornamenti sulle proteste sono arrivati direttamente dal profilo X di [UNI Global Union](https://x.com/uniglobalunion), che conferma la diffusione capillare degli scioperi, che stanno avvenendo in Nordamerica, Europa, Asia e persino Australia, per un totale di 20 Paesi diversi sparsi in tutto il mondo. Le proteste, al grido di "Make Amazon Pay", sono state indette per sottolineare "gli abusi della manodopera, la degradazione dell'ambiente e le minacce alla democrazia" collegati ad Amazon. Ovviamente, l'idea alla base dello sciopero è quella di colpire Amazon nel giorno più importante dell'anno, il Black Friday, in cui milioni di persone in tutto il mondo utilizzano la piattaforma per fare acquisti online.
Amazon ormai vale 2,2 trilioni di Dollari e, con il [lancio dell'IA Amazon Rufus](https://tech.everyeye.it/notizie/cosa-rufus-perch-amazon-tiene-tanto-729477.html), ha dimostrato di saper diversificare i settori in cui opera, spaziando dalle vendite al dettaglio ai server e ai datacenter, fino al settore dell'IA, allo streaming online e via dicendo. I lavoratori in sciopero chiedono dunque che Amazon aumenti i loro salari, migliori le condizioni lavorative e permetta la formazione di sindacati in piena regola nei Paesi in cui essi non sono ancora ammessi.
La questione tocca da vicino anche i clienti europei: benché la campagna "Make Amazon Pay" non abbia toccato l'Italia, in Germania il gruppo Vereinte Dienstleistungsgewerkschaft (Unione dei Sindacati del Settore dei Servizi) del centro Amazon di Brema ha annunciato su [X](https://x.com/verdiAmazon_NDS/status/1862396966900019327?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1862396966900019327%7Ctwgr%5E3efc40639661bc6109b3c88775df11a83b16b1c0%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.engadget.com%2Fbig-tech%2Famazon-workers-across-the-globe-are-on-strike-for-black-friday-174745422.html) uno sciopero fino a lunedì 2 dicembre (il Cyber Monday). In India, dove gli scioperi sembrano aver attirato molta più attenzione che nel resto del mondo, centinaia di persone hanno protestato a Nuova Delhi e nel resto del Paese, sull'onda di presunti maltrattamenti da parte della compagnia nei confronti dei suoi operai nel pieno di un'ondata di caldo record.
[Su Apple AirPods 4 Auricolari wireless, Auricolari Bluetooth, Audio è uno dei più venduti di oggi.](https://www.amazon.it/dp/B0DGHWD7CT?tag=notizie_tech-21)
FONTE:

author: DataHorizzon Research
title: Swollen Knee Treatment Market To Reach USD 1.9 Billion By
text: Fort Collins, Colorado, May 10, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The growth of the swollen knee treatment market is positively projected in the forecast period. The global market for [swollen knee treatment](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=dNzz24Faa_2xvR4MnPdNwLw0KvC0SVdKREAcfYwJ9aLMbHDj4hTuMNLsR9AZ_GI6AbPVXZFJcGDqVQV66vPRK3uvY3l54RLirIuM8LM8b_g=) comprises diverse options and approaches to manage and address knee swelling, a prevalent condition resulting from injuries, arthritis, infections, or other medical issues. This market encompasses various products and services, including pharmaceuticals, medical devices, physical therapy, and surgical procedures. Key market growth drivers include an aging population, the increasing incidence of arthritis and sports-related injuries, advancements in medical technology, and more significant healthcare expenditures. Consequently, the global swollen knee treatment market is anticipated to experience consistent growth, supported by ongoing research and development efforts to introduce new and enhanced treatment modalities. The swollen knee treatment market is experiencing notable growth, primarily due to the escalating prevalence of arthritis, notably osteoarthritis, among the aging demographic. As per the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), approximately 58.5 million adults in the United States were afflicted with arthritis in 2020, with osteoarthritis emerging as the predominant form. Furthermore, the heightened engagement in sports and physical activities has elevated the risk of knee injuries, amplifying the demand for effective swollen knee treatments. The evolution of minimally invasive treatment modalities, such as arthroscopic surgery and injection therapies, has propelled the expansion of the swollen knee treatment market. Compared to conventional open surgeries, these sophisticated techniques offer swifter recovery times, diminished pain, and enhanced patient outcomes. As indicated by a study featured in the Journal of Arthroscopic and Related Surgery, the global arthroscopy devices market is projected to attain a value of $6.5 billion by 2026, underscoring the rise in the adoption of minimally invasive procedures for knee ailments. Request Sample Report: Segmentation Overview: The swollen knee treatment market has been segmented into drug type, condition, distribution channel, and region. Osteoarthritis is a leading segment projected to grow substantially in the coming years. - Osteoarthritis is a degenerative joint disease that primarily affects the elderly. The knee is one of the most commonly affected joints. Based on the increasing prevalence of bone disorders and the need for effective treatment, osteoarthritis was a leading segment for the condition category in 2023. NSAIDs are the leading segments for drug type having prominent growth. - Based on drug type, the largest segment in 2023 is likely to be non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs). NSAIDs are widely prescribed for the management of swollen knees due to their anti-inflammatory and analgesic properties. Ask For Discount Swollen Knee Treatment Market Report Highlights: - The swollen knee treatment market growth is anticipated at a CAGR of 4.8% by 2032. - The emerging regenerative therapies and personalized medicine drive the swollen knee treatment market. - The Asia-Pacific region is projected to be the fastest-growing regional market for swollen knee treatment in the near future. A report by the World Health Organization (WHO) states that osteoarthritis, a significant contributor to swollen knees, is increasing rapidly in the Asia-Pacific region due to factors such as aging populations, and lifestyle changes. - Some prominent players in the swollen knee treatment market report include Zimmer Biomet, Stryker Corporation, DePuy Synthes (Johnson & Johnson), Arthrex, Inc., Smith & Nephew plc, Medtronic plc, Össur hf, Breg, Inc., DJO Global, Inc., and Bauerfeind AG. Looking Exclusively For Region/Country Specific Report? About DataHorizzon Research: DataHorizzon is a market research and advisory company that assists organizations across the globe in formulating growth strategies for changing business dynamics. Its offerings include consulting services across enterprises and business insights to make actionable decisions. DHR’s comprehensive research methodology for predicting long-term and sustainable trends in the market facilitates complex decisions for organizations. author: SPIE Europe Ltd
title: Novel UV broadband spectrometer revolutionizes air pollution analysis
text:
11 Apr 2024
TU Graz's laser-based technology enables continual RT monitoring of contaminants.
A research team led by Birgitta Schultze-Bernhardt from the
Institute of Experimental Physics at Graz University of Technology (TU Graz) is now utilizing this high reaction potential for a new method of environmental monitoring. They have developed the world’s first broadband UV dual-comb spectrometer with which air pollutants can be continually measured and their reaction with the environment can be observed in real time.
The development is described in
Optica.
Dual-comb spectrometers have been around for almost 20 years. Here, a source emits light in a broad wavelength range, which, when arranged according to its optical frequencies, is reminiscent of the teeth of a comb. If this light penetrates a gaseous material sample, the molecules it contains absorb some of the light. The altered light wavelengths allow conclusions to be drawn about the ingredients and optical properties of the analysed gas.
Laser pulses cause molecules to vibrate
The special feature of the spectrometer developed by Schultze-Bernhardt is that a laser system emits double light pulses in the ultraviolet spectrum. When this UV light meets gas molecules, it excites the molecules electronically and also causes them to rotate and vibrate – so-called rovibronic transitions – which are unique to each gaseous substance.
In addition, the broadband UV dual-comb spectrometer combines three properties that conventional spectrometers have so far only been able to offer in part:
“This makes our spectrometer suitable for sensitive measurements by which changes in gas concentrations and the course of chemical reactions can be observed very precisely,” said Lukas Fürst, PhD student in the Coherent Sensing working group and first author of the publication.
Tested using formaldehyde as example
The researchers developed and tested their spectrometer using formaldehyde. The air pollutant is produced when fossil fuels and wood are burned, as well as indoors through vapors from adhesives used in furniture.
“With our new spectrometer, formaldehyde emissions in the textile or wood processing industries as well as in cities with increased smog levels can be monitored in real time, thus improving the protection of personnel and the environment,” said Birgitta Schultze-Bernhardt.
The application of the spectrometer can also be transferred to other air pollutants such as nitrogen oxides and ozone and other climate-relevant trace gases. The research team hopes that this will provide new findings about their effects in the atmosphere. Based on this, new strategies for improving air quality could be derived.
|© 2024 |

author: Roger Vélez
title: Ecuador resalta informes de OEA y UE que 'desmienten narrativas de fraude'
text:
Ecuador resalta informes de OEA y UE que "desmienten narrativas de fraude"
El Gobierno ecuatoriano, a través de la Cancillería, resalta una "jornada electoral pacífica, ordenada y democrática" en el país. Sostiene que los informes de los principales observadores internacionales "desmienten narrativas de fraude".
El presidente Daniel Noboa, en una entrevista para CNN, en el Palacio de Gobierno, el 15 de abril de 2025.
- Foto
Presidencia
Autor:
Actualizada:
Compartir:
Como una "jornada electoral pacífica, ordenada y democrática", así destacó el Gobierno ecuatoriano, a través de la Cancillería, a la jornada electoral que terminó en la reelección de Daniel Noboa como presidente para los próximos años.
El comunicado llegó después que los presidentes de Colombia, Gustavo Petro; de México, Claudia Sheinbaum, hasta Nicolás Maduro, quien se mantiene en el poder en Venezuela acusado de fraude electoral, sembraran dudas sobre los comicios del 13 de abril en Ecuador.
Los mandatarios de esos países se hicieron eco de las acusaciones de fraude, sin pruebas, lanzadas por la excandidata presidencial de la Revolución Ciudadana, Luisa González, y su mentor, Rafael Correa, sobre la segunda vuelta electoral.
En el comunicado, el Gobierno "saluda el trabajo realizado por las misiones de observación electoral de la Organización de Estados Americanos (OEA) y de la Unión Europea (UE) que da cuenta de la jornada electoral efectuada el 13 de abril de forma transparente y que reafirma la vocación democrática del pueblo ecuatoriano".
"Al expresar su confianza en los resultados oficiales presentados por el Consejo Nacional Electoral (CNE), ambas misiones desmienten las narrativas de fraude, al constatar la coincidencia de la información compilada por los observadores con los datos arrojados por el sistema informático de escrutinios y resultados del CNE", señala.
A diferencia de Petro, Sheinbaum y Maduro, otros presidentes como Donald Trump, de Estados Unidos, Emmanuel Macron, de Francia; Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, de Brasil; Gabriel Boric, entre otros, han enviado mensajes de felicitación a Noboa por su reelección para el periodo 2025-2029.
De allí que en el comunicado, el Gobierno del Ecuador también "manifiesta su aprecio por las numerosas felicitaciones emitidas por jefes y jefas de Estado y de Gobierno y otras autoridades extranjeras, en reconocimiento de la decisión adoptada por el pueblo ecuatoriano".
